game_instances.initial_prompt:
We are currently in this room <image>. Please help me with the following task. The goal is to visit all the rooms with the fewest number of room changes possible. In each room you need to decide the direction to go in. Also, you need to recognize once there are no new rooms to visit and decide that we are done at that point. Please give your answer in the following format: “GO: <direction>”: to step into a new room, replace direction with one of [north, south, east, west]. “DONE”: This will end the game and we will be graded.
Let us start. 
From this room we can go in the following directions: $INITIAL_DIRECTIONS$. What should we do?
game_instances.success_response: We are now in this room <image>. From here we can go: $DIRECTIONS$. What should we do?
game_instances.invalid_response: The move was invalid and we are still in this room <image>. From here we can go: $DIRECTIONS$. What should we do?
game_instances.reprompt_format: Please only give your answer in the given format so I can understand it. To move to a nieghboring room answer with "GO: <direction>" and replace <direction> with one of the available directions which are: $DIRECTIONS$. If you think there are no more rooms we need to visit, simply anser with "DONE". What should we do?
game_instances.limit_warning: We have been exploring for a while now. If you think we have seen most rooms simply respond with "DONE".
game_instances.loop_warning: It seems like we are going back and forth between two rooms. If you want to stop exploring simply respond with "DONE".
